name: GoodMorning VR
description:
A VR experience tribute to Rudy Francisco's "Good Morning", experience the joy of waking up through Rudy Francisco's eyes.

NOTE 1:  This experience relies on having a virtual representation of the environment you're actually in - in real life. I have modeled my bedroom and can of course can play in here as much as I want. But you don't live in my house probably so I am looking to support importing your own models for those of you that are able to get models of your own homes/play areas.

NOTE 2: This is for Windows headsets only for now.  Gotta wait till Steam releases a new OpenVR compatible api for me to port this over.
